description: A schema which validates params accepted by the AppNexus adapter
title: Appnexus Adapter Params

___traffic_source_code.description: Specifies the third-party source of this impression.

___reserve.description: The minimium acceptable bid, in CPM, using US Dollars

___placement_id.description: An ID which identifies this placement of the impression

___inv_code.description: A code identifying the inventory of this placement.

___private_sizes.description: Private sizes (ex: [{"w": 300, "h": 250},{...}]), experimental, may not be supported.

___use_pmt_rule.description: Boolean to signal AppNexus to apply the relevant payment rule

items.description: A key with one or more values associated with it. These are used in buy-side segment targeting.

___member.description: An ID which identifies the member selling the impression.

___position.description: Specifies the ad unit as above or below the fold
